Author: EZ.Exchange
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [EZX] EZ Exchange: Platform for Simple & Secure Crypto Trading
Body: Hello all, we are excited to announce our EZ Exchange 2018 Token Sweepstakes, in this promotion we are awarding a prize pool of 25,000 EZX tokens to 50 winners.  Sweepstakes link: https://gleam.io/Vjlm1/ez-exchange-token-sweepstakes-25000-ezx-tokens  Sweepstakes Rules:   - There will be total of randomly drawn fifty (50) winners at the conclusion of the initial coin offering (ICO). The rewards for each winner are specified in the list below.  - Participants are awarded entries into the sweepstakes for completing the simple tasks below. Some of these tasks can be repeated, and additional means for gaining entries will be added over the course of the sweepstakes. A participant's chances of winning improves with a higher number of entries into the sweepstakes, so check back often to give yourself the greatest chance for winning a prize.   - Participants must remain on the EZ Exchange social media channels (i.e. Telegram, Twitter, Facebook, Youtube, Reddit) and have an active social media account until the end of sweepstakes to qualify.  - Winners will be contacted by email upon conclusion of the ICO and will have up fourteen (14) days to claim their prize. Winner's must respond with a valid Ethereum address to receive payment of their winning prize.  - Participants must be at least 18 years old to participate.  - Participants must use a valid first and last name.  - Participants who use multiple accounts will be disqualified.  - EZ Exchange reserves the right to make changes to the giveaway.     Prize List:  1st place - 5000 EZX tokens  2nd place - 3000 EZX tokens  3rd place - 2500 EZX tokens  4th place - 2000 EZX tokens  5th place - 1250 EZX tokens  6th - 50th place – 250 EZX tokens   Good luck everyone!

Author: EZ.Exchange
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [EZX] EZ Exchange: Platform for Simple & Secure Crypto Trading
Body: What was your experience when you first starting crypto?  Was education materials on blockchain and crypto easy to find?  What if there was an institution that offered educational courses on blockchain and crypto to help you learn and grow as you trade? Our learning platform, EZ Academy, offers just that.  Learn more in our Project Team Mentor, Rick Tapia’s, blog: http://bit.ly/EZAcademycrypto  Interested in hearing your thoughts on what your experience was in finding resources when you first started trading crypto and the types of educational materials that would benefit you now as a regular trader.
